item.description:
WFNX will be at Shenanigans in South Boston from 10 to 12 PM on Thursday night giving out lift tickets to Cannon for Saturday the 21st. We've been going to their other events this winter and the lift tickets are easy to get.

Then Friday night we'll all be heading up to the Brettl-Hupfers lodge to ski Cannon on Saturday. It's about 45 minutes to Cannon from the lodge.

Members of the club will be getting together at Shenanigans for this event. We'll probably be as close to the DJ booth as we can get and wearing Brettl-Hupfer logo gear. I will also send out my cell phone number to any Yes RSVPS so we can make sure everyone finds our group.

Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be close to the DJ and wearing Brettl-Hupfers gear
item.name: FNX Snoriders Warmup Party for Cannon Mtn
